```esql
ROW price = 10, color = ["blue", "pink", "yellow"], size = ["s", "m", "l"]
| STATS SUM(price) BY color, size
```

| SUM(price):long | color:keyword | size:keyword |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 10 | blue | l |
| 10 | blue | m |
| 10 | blue | s |
| 10 | pink | l |
| 10 | pink | m |
| 10 | pink | s |
| 10 | yellow | l |
| 10 | yellow | m |
| 10 | yellow | s |
